website_summaries.verdict: This bidet-style toilet seat comes with a heated function and can also blow warm air.
pros: Remote control makes operation very simple
Water heats up inside the bidet
Comes in an affordable price range
Has many features in addition to the heated seat
An elongated and rounded model are both available
cons: When problems with the product arise the company is hard to contact and may not be terribly responsive

customer_reviews.title: Great bidet
customer_reviews.text: After deliberating for months I finally bought the smart bidet. I'm a 50 year old woman and was able to easily install the bidet with a screwdriver, crescent wrench, and plumbers tape. It took me about 30 minutes and then checking back to make sure it wasn't leaking. I LUV this bidet. It does stick out beyond the toilet but that is better than having a smallish seat hole. Be prepared before trying turbo. Very cleansing😁
customer_reviews.author: Maria A

customer_reviews.title: Promptly broke after the 12 month warrantee with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half of very limited use the female cleansing function has ceased to operate. Conveniently for the seller, the warrantee expires after 12 months. The "rear" cleaning option if far too powerful even on the lowest setting, so it's basically useless to us now. The nozzle does not move very far forward, making the user engage in some strange posturing in order to get clean on either function. Basically, we purchased a very expensive heated seat.
customer_reviews.author: jenbot

customer_reviews.title: overloads and trips the circuit breaker
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but did its job. but after 2 years our circuit breaker keeps tripping. I contacted the company who offered me 25% discount on purchasing body replacement which costs $119.90. the company also, sent me a link on how to replace it which would be extremely difficult to do especially since I suffer from many medical issues. Although, the company's customer service has been good in their response but I think it is completely ridiculous to spend extra money to get this fixed and not know for sure if this is going to happen again in the future. This will be one expensive bidet.
customer_reviews.author: farah

customer_reviews.title: It Died After a Great 2-Year Run!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it until it stopped working. Not worth the price. I prefer others. ....And my Toto, too.
customer_reviews.author: Hanala Sagal

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you'd expect from an at-home bidet in the affordable price range. The fact that I can move the water flow speed and location in real time is amazing. The dryer doesn't do the job 100% but no dryer does, so just a few pats with TP after the dry cycle and you're all set. I wish I had made this plunge years ago. Props to the team as well who responded within 2 hours about my issue with a free converter that was included. It's not the prettiest thing to look at, but I'm not going for looks with this thing, I'm going for improvement of life!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: The Intelliseat replacement
customer_reviews.text: As a previous owner of the AMDM Intelliseat, this bidet is the exact same. It's literally the same model just branded differently. My Intelliseat died after 5+ years of rigorous use. In my opinion this bidet is amazing and has a price that's a steal. This was a no brainier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Barzelay

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS WANTED A BIDET AND NOW I HAVE ONE WITHOUT A SEPARATE BOWL AND/OR EXPENSIVE INSTALLATION IN MY SMALL BATH!
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. SO NICE TO FEEL CLEAN AND AVOID IRRITATION - OR SOOTHE IRRITATION WHEN NEEDED. EASY TO INSTALL. DID NOT HAVE TO CALL AN ELECTRICIAN AS I FOUND THE PERFECT SURGE PROTECTOR WITH A LITTLE EXTRA CORD THAT REACHED FAR ENOUGH. NICE WHEN I CAN DO A COMPLETE INSTALL MYSELF. EVERYTHING I NEEDED TO CONNECT WATER SUPPLY WAS INCLUDED. I INSTALLED THE CRADLE FOR THE REMOTE CONTROL UNDER THE T.P. HOLDER.. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND. TOOK A LITTLE TIME TO GET USED TO NOT BEING ABLE TO SIT ON THE TOILET WITH THE LID DOWN TO PUT ON SHOES, TRIM TOENAILS, ETC., BUT NOT A PROBLEM NOW... JUST SIT WITH THE LID UP - DUH!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Dee in NC

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: Two people have now spent over 6 hours trying to install this bidet, to no avail. The issue is that the water supply hose is really short - yet it is supposed to be attached to the tap at the wall. In our case, the hose just isn't long enough to reach the tap. We have gotten additional/alternative connectors to try and attach the hose under the water tank of the toilet (like all other bidets) but it just doesn't work as the plastic water hose leaks when it is attached there. We are throwing in the towel and returning this.
customer_reviews.author: A&C

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old $650 bidet
customer_reviews.text: Update: Remote stopped working after 2 years.... But it seems all bidets I have owned at around 2 years. Second time bidet buyer here. This one is way better than my $650 unit that lasted only 1.5 years. Only one negative thing about this unit is the warm water is not on demand. It takes time to charge it up. Spray is powerful, dryer rocks, seat warms fast..also glad it does not have the useless deodorizer on it. My old bidet had it and it did nothing. The remote is also super responsive. Great unit do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: MadDad

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be...  For the money and features, it is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Same features and I think even same company/model of the one I had a few years ago that I loved. I got this one for a new house and since the other one was in storage for so long, I thought I would start fresh. The water pressure isn't great, even though my bathroom has great pressure, and the arm location and oscillating features not as good as previous unit. i wondered if I got a bad one, but it is ok enough to keep it, as I suspect the quality has just diminished from previous years.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: Read review
customer_reviews.text: I changed my first review from 5 stars to 1 star. Long story. Bidet features began not working, contacted sellers. After many discussions another was sent. The second bidet upon plumber opening box bidet had water in it. Did not work, many things wrong. Amazon stepped in to assist this problem. 3rd bidet was sent by Amazon, works perfectly thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.  Blake

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Toto
customer_reviews.text: Installation went smoothly (not my first), minutes later water leaking from the power cord inlet. Returned. Perhaps the packaging wasn't up to snuff, although there was no visible external damage to the packaging or unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bidet with great features.
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this on my Kohler toilet with a round seat. The Bidet seat is more comfortable then what came with the Kohler toilet. The SB-1000WR has great features, the remote works well. The heated seat is marvelous and the turbo butt clean works fantastic. I find the heated dryer works well too. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 was because I had to make a trip to Home Depot to buy a new 3/8" T adapter. The one that came with the bidet leaked badly. I believe the rubber gasket was defective. But so far I am very happy with the bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: This is a definite win glad I brought it.
customer_reviews.text: Their was a little learning curve for me getting myself in the right position for the beget to do it's thing. However this is great to have so much more environmental friendly while feeling cleaner. They are now finding tons of so called flushable wipes clogging up our sewers. Always great when you can feel clean while being a little more responsible for the environment. I decide to buy this unit with the remote because the controls are easier to see. I have it placed next to the toilet and it never leaves. People come over they always make positive comments about it if they use my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: David Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Nine months and going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have saved so much paper, and have been so happy with this Bidet. The only issue, is I've had to have an extension cord running into my bathroom to power it. Besides that, on occasion, you need to re-position yourself now and then for the best coverage, but all in all, I couldn't be happier. The water gets hot if you want, the drying cycle is great. I will run the water and dryer twice if my situation was... severe. You will be so spoiled. I spent months looking, and this was the best model to jump in on. Don't pay hundreds more, I'm not even sure what could be better with higher cost units.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf_CPT

customer_reviews.title: Great bidet. Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the supplies that were enclosed; the only needed item was plumber's tape. Installation went smoothly. My first bidet and it works like a charm. Multiple settings for water pressure, nozzle direction and temperature controls for the bidet and seat. The toilet cover is not really meant to be sat on; it's made of thin hardened plastic. I wish the remote control had more illumination to read the wording on the remote in the dark. After researching many bidets, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: t c

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for our 35 year old unmarried daughter who is a Nurse Practitioner and used her medical skills to greatly improve my wife's health condition by advocating for dramatically adjusting her medications. For what she did for us, she deserves the best bidet system - and this one fit the bill. It appears to be quality built. It was easy for dear ol' Dad to install. I really like the fact that it has its own warm water tank, warm air dryer, warm toilet seat and a multi-function remote control. No need to twist around on the seat to reach controls. Great design. Don't look any further for a quality bidet. This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Bailey

customer_reviews.title: A Clean Tushy is a Happy Tushy
customer_reviews.text: This Bidet is amazing! Easy to install and so much more hygienic than just using toilet paper alone. Lets face it, in these trying times, TP can be hard to come by; with this, there are no more wasted trips to the Big Box stores, in the hopes of scoring a family pack of Charmin. Or worse yet, having to use a paper towel because you just ran out! This is an easy economical and environmentally sound solution to toilet paper. Why wipe, when you can bathe your butt in cleansing warm water, with a soothing blow dry when your done! You'll be happy you made the investment and so will your significant other.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: A bidet is a good thing. Unfortunately the seat itself is inadequate when it comes to the average cleaning products. It stains deeply when a caustic cleaner is used and you don't know its caustic until you use it. Other quality seats do not stain at all. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Przystas

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice, I tried and I even like it
customer_reviews.text: Update! The seller is super fast and nice on solving this issue, we enjoy using it everyday! Good choice to buy. I bought this for my dad for Father's Day. It is really nice, I tried and I even like it. The reason I am giving 3 stars, is that the T shape water connector is leaking a little. We had to go to Home Depot and buy a new one. After we changed that part (see picture) it is working just fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Chen

customer_reviews.title: The control broke down after one year of installation and ...
customer_reviews.text: The control broke down after one year of installation and I bought a new one. After two years of installation, the cover broke down and all features stopped working completely. It is disappointing. Service centers can not be found. So I am going to buy another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: John Y. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase to date! ♡
customer_reviews.text: It's still early in the year, but I foresee this being my best purchase of 2016! I knew I wanted a bidet, and while a 'top of the line' model wasn't in my budget, I still had a pretty considerable list of 'must haves'. ' Warm Seat & Water Option, ' Feminine & Posterior Mode, ' Air Dryer, ' Remote Control, ' Easy Assembly. I am super satisfied with this purchase! So much so, I ordered one for my mom! Got them both for just under $500. Hands free washing is a life changer. #Winning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the bidet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bidet. I thought the remote control was frivolous but actually quite useful to place anywhere on the wall that is convenient. My only complaint, and good is my fault for not following up on the problem, is I ordered a round seat and did not realize an oval seat had been delivered. Kept it because it didn't make a noticeable difference on the toilet. Overall very happy with product and easily recommend it. Also, very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: J. McChesney

customer_reviews.title: Missing a few final touches
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings on this one. Price is hard to beat, but two major shortcomings: 1) there is no charcoal filter to eliminate odors and 2) it doesn't remember the nozzle position on a per function basis. So, if you are two people using separate functions, you will have to adjust the nozzle position every time you use it. It really should have a separate memory for Feminine, Male, and Turbo. Otherwise it gets the job done. Also, the supplied water supply adapter didn't fit so I had to visit Home Depot to complete the installation. $5 so no big deal, but frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Morten Kristiansen

customer_reviews.title: Do it. Do it. Do it.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I fawdled for over two years before buying this. Game changer in terms of sanitation and toilet paper usage. Pros: affordable, easy to install, has a remote and a skin sensor so curious ones can’t get sprayed in the face. It can warm the water and the seat, has an eco mode. Con: not many in my opinion, if I were being critical, the dryer. It’s a little weak. To be fair, I don’t think it’s realistic to expect hand dryer levels of wind in something so small. Overall, it’s a game changer and well worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Maribell

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had an absolutely identical one bought from Costco (where is sold under a different name). It is excellent in all respects and easy to install. But now I understand why the former one cracked i.e., it should not be cleaned with detergents. The SB-1000 comes with a clear recommendation in this regard. Also SB-1000 comes with everything necessary to install it (you will not need to go a buy a reduction as mentioned by earlier buyers).
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Remote has problem, stop working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in July 2018. This month, one of them broke. I always have problem with the remote control, it stopped working, I tried to press hard, then disconnected the wire and reconnected it back and it worked again. Then finally it dead. When it worked, I love the oscillation feature. Hot water is the right temp. I don't use the blow dry that much. I'm going to try another electric bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: I bought this on a whim for our current bath ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim for our current bath remodel. I am not going to lie it makes the not so pleasant aspects of being human more enjoyable. The heated seat is particularly mesmerizing in conjunction with the blower. Looking forward to a winter day....to use the bathroom. A sentence I never thought I would utter, let alone in an amazon review but truth. This has also made social interactions a little awkward at my house because when my friends come over, my first question is "DO YOU HAVE TO POOP"? "OK JUST SIT DOWN THOUGH, WITH YOUR PANTS OFF, IT"S WORTH IT".
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: As for the ease of installation and the functional aspects of this product, that's all just fine. However, two minor issues prevents me from rating five star. 1) Tried to get a copy of the manual on line and no dice unless you want to pay or jump through hoops. That should have been easy and free. Went on to their web site and requested a copy; never heard back from them. 2) If you're used to putting the lid down on the toilet and using it for a place to sit you will be disappointed as the lid is a flimsy plastic and you'll crush it if you sit on it. Aside from that,I'm happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Str8shooter

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this due to the low price point, but you pay what you get, it did not last. Use the money and get some other brand. A little over a year, the system would not work, as if no power. After a day of 2, it started working again, however some functions were broken (water heater, oscillation, and feminine wash). Basically it just sprayed cold water. 2 months later, the system completely stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Glad we made the switch, can't wait to save on TP
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about "making the switch" so glad we did. We used toilet paper the 1st couple of times afterwards just to test it but quickly realized that we just didn't need toilet paper anymore and can actually trust the cleaning capability of our new bidet. The remote is hard to read, actually need our reading glasses at first until we figured out the settings and which buttons were which. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: MaCorSr

customer_reviews.title: Every home needs a heated throne
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from MS which makes standing up hard. I recently remolded my bathroom and the contractor mentioned a bidet, which I dismissed. A year later I gave it some thought and started looking in to getting a bidet, and after seeing what, they now offer with heated water, heated seat, a blow dryers, and a remote. After looking at price, options, and reviews I chose the SB-1000, and I love it. Installation was easy, with a well written manual, and it works better then expected, we love it, what a deal for the price. If your looking for a bidet, look no further then the SB-1000, as this will soon be the best seat in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 of these. BOTH begin dripping and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these. BOTH begin dripping and not functioning properly, eventually not working at all within the 1st year of purchase. For the price, these seemed to offer the most bang for your buck, but they fail to mention that they need to be replaced every 3 months. I am looking for a new bidet (for my 120# mother-the ONLY person to ever use the unit), and will NOT be looking for anything from SmartBidet. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This was our Second SmartBidet SB1000 and we love it.
customer_reviews.text: We installed the first unit in a new bathroom we added in NH where we had 2 other bathrooms ,and afterwards this was the only one used. We left to go to Fl for the winter and missed this unit enough to order one for this house within two weeks . The installation of this unit is less than an hour because everything you need is there. The actual operation is super easy and very efficient . Lets face it (which you can't ) ,with this unit you are confident the cleaning job get's done .
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mills

customer_reviews.title: Lousy instruction manual, good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, but the installation manual and insert are in the toilet--totally incomplete, and you have to be an engineering graduate to figure out how to install it. If this was my company, I'd hire a professional company to totally redo the instructions and photos. As is, only a few could install this themselves as there are critical parts and procedures that are totally absent in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: steve towe

customer_reviews.title: welcome to the civilized world
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy a second intelliseat bidet but they are no longer exist, this smartbidet is identical in every way except for the brand and prints. have a little bit of struggle when first installed as the wand won't move initially. manually pull the wand to unstuck the mechanism and do the trick. now all my bathroom at home equipped with these bidet/washlet. cleanliness plus warm toilet seat can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: franzilla

customer_reviews.title: I own SmartBidet SB-1000 and the TOTO SW2044
customer_reviews.text: Bought both bidets within the past few months and find the SmartBidet is a better performer and value. The SmartBidet has better water pressure and a slightly larger seat opening. The TOTO is more refined in design and operation. The TOTO does a satisfactory job but water pressure is lacking which can be an inconvenience. The TOTO features that SmartBidet doesn't offer, is the bowl pre-mist and the room deodorizer which are real positives but SmartBidet is close to 1/2 the price, has more comfortable seat and offers better water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Balanced reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bidet in its price range. We love the remote!
customer_reviews.text: After hours of reading reviews and item descriptions, I chose the SB 1000. It was a quick 10-15 minute installation after delivery. We left a small bowl under the new water connection, just in case of drips. No drips after 2 weeks! All the described features work as expected. I would advise every household get one! I’ve never felt cleaner and the heated seat is nice on a cold winters morning. The remote has settings that take a little practice to find that “just right” temperature and position. After that, a person can literally operate it with their eyes closed. I know the air dry feature works, but we don’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Toyhauler

customer_reviews.title: Good value after testing many in the homes and hotels of Japan and Europe.
customer_reviews.text: The features offered by the Smart Bidet are comparable to many of the units costing far more. I don't need the lighted bowl feature others offer or the pre-spray option. This system is well worth it's cost if you are in to the whole wash the bum thing. The only disappointment I have found is that the water does go cold before the end of the spray session. It wasn't enough of a problem to keep me from buying one for the other bathroom. It's an easy install and set up. The second one goes cold before it's done, as well, but most people who have used it say they end the session themselves before the big chill.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Very slow, dryer doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It works okay, but I wouldn’t buy this one again. The dryer has very little power, so you can sit there until it shuts itself off and you’d still be dripping. Also, it takes longer than I’m used to for the water and fan to start working. The cord is very short, so unless you have a plug directly next to the toilet, you’ll need an extension cord with three prongs. Other than that, setup was pretty painless. All I needed was a wrench, a large screwdriver and extension cord. The seat fits well and the directions were clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the Butt
customer_reviews.text: It is GREAT at what it does and super convenient, especially if you cant access hot water but can access electricity. The heated seat and the remote control are nice additions. Having a bidet is life-changing. The drier is very weak and is basically pointless. Setting it up was a huge pain because of my bathroom setup. Plan several hours and a trip to the hardware store just in case. I know others found it easy but the instructions are not enough. You will need to use plumbers tape on everything which is not specified in the instructions. I know this seems obvious but it promised easy installation for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kesselring

customer_reviews.title: Should be standard equipment
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is not buying one sooner for reasons too numerous to mention, but I'll try. #1 - fresh from the shower feeling; some medications can give me bathroom issues and this solves one of them. #2 - so easy to install - I did it myself. #3 -I wish I had one of these when I was a younger woman too. The first use is a little surprising but it's so nice to feel so clean it was easy to get used to. Not to mention; why didn't anyone tell me how nice it is to have a heated seat?
customer_reviews.author: Tricia in the Trees

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought their lowest cost, non heated, non electric version first, which I liked a lot, good flow and it doesn't hurt when you put it on high flow rates. Mom didn't like the cold water tho. So...we bought the deluxe one, too, yup we got two of them now. She likes the heated water and seat but they should put a manual valve on it like the low cost version has. The "turbo" function makes a jet of water too small. That's why the cheap one works good, you can have high flow rates without it being uncomfortable. The writing on the remote is too small for elderly people to read.
customer_reviews.author: cat feeder

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a bidet seat for a long time and researched several before buying. Smart Bidet is moderately priced and works great, I'm sure just as good as the more expensive models. The remote has multiple settings for seat temperature, water temp, air temp and position of the nozzle. The dryer takes a minute to dry so a little patience is needed. I just recently have had the unit stop working and I notified the company who immediately offered to replace the parts. I am impressed with their response! Note: the sprayer does need occasional cleaning to keep the unit in good working order.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Slaton

customer_reviews.title: It's all so good! This is one of the best purchases we ...
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin? The warm seat? The oscillating spray of hot water? or is it the blast of hot air to dry off? It's all so good! This is one of the best purchases we have ever made. The install kit worked perfect however be sure to look at the online YouTube videos as they explain the seat bolt in process better than the written instructions. Wish we had bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Contractor

customer_reviews.title: ... seat exactly to specifications in guide and am very disappointed that the nozzle will not extend
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Called customer service and they helped me fix the problem easily! Now we love this product!!! PREVIOUS: Installed seat exactly to specifications in guide and am very disappointed that the nozzle will not extend. Water just trickles out into the toilet from where the nozzle should extend. I have tried troubleshooting with the guide but to no avail. This was a Christmas present, and now after 2 hours I have to go to the trouble of boxing it up and sending it back and reinstalling my old seat just to have a usable bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Baron von Diebl

customer_reviews.title: READ low star reviews: quality is poor; very limited lifetime past warranty
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE: (Like other reviewers): product dies after warranty expires. Really like easy installation and having the seat. Master bathroom became the “go to place” for complete family; they liked the functionality so much. We used it for about 20 months. Then... completely dead. No way to diagnose or fix at reasonable process or cost. Going out tomorrow and buying a replacement at Costco....
customer_reviews.author: Mark M-E

customer_reviews.title: SmartBidet SB-1000
customer_reviews.text: First, this unit was not for me so I have not used it. It is being used by a person that just had a shoulder replaced so his ability to do simple things is limited. He says this allows easier use of the toilet. This unit installs fairly straight forward. There was an adaptor for the water line but of course it was not the correct size for this installation. Also it required power which is unusual to have by the toilet so power needed to be run. That being said, the installation of the seat is simple and seems to be well designed.
customer_reviews.author: ERB

customer_reviews.title: Sizing & spray target
customer_reviews.text: Loved: warm seat, warm water, remote control, soft closing, easy installation (unless you have a really tight space like mine) Disliked: Water does not get the target...especially feminine. Had to really contort myself and then it did not hit in the front part of 'target'. Rear target ok. Also, width of seat...much narrower than regular toilet seat...hits sitz bones, no place to sit in bathroom anymore unless you lift seat, sorter 'target' for men.
customer_reviews.author: jamalily

customer_reviews.title: Pro Pooping Status Achieved
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Works the same as a Toto for a lot less. My only complaint is with the installation. They only send out a 3/8 OD adapter and a 1/2” OD adapter. Most homes prior to the mid 90’s have a different 3/8 thread type. This required a couple of trips and fittings at Home Depot to get right. If they included the right adapter for these homes, it would be a knockout 5 Stars. I’m not a plumber, I’m an electrician so sorry about any bad plumbing grammar.
customer_reviews.author: wyatthimself

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best decision I've ever made for my family. For awhile, I had the cheap little clip on ones that go under your current toilet seat. These were ok, but this is spectacular. Warm water, warm seat, and warm air. It's absolutely, positively awful to use any other toilet after having these! You feel clean when you leave the restroom and you save the environment from toilet paper waste too! Buy this, seriously buy it! Your bottom will thank you, and so will your family!
customer_reviews.author: firemedic2008

customer_reviews.title: Good price, wonderful upgrade from a cold water model.
customer_reviews.text: I"m coming from a cold water, under seat bidet, and this is a wonderful upgrade. Warm seat at night is heaven. I'd gotten used to cold water wash in the summer, but it's getting a little icy now that it's fall. Pretty easy to install for a 70 year old woman who hates plumbing. Luckily I had them put in a convenient outlet when they remodeled. I attached the remote holster to the leg of a stool right next to my tub. Everything works fine. The air dryer is nice if you have the time, Price is better than I expected when I decided to upgrade, so I'm a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: KGinOregon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the features
customer_reviews.text: This unit may be the current sweet spot between cost and features. Handheld remote (not attached to the side of the seat), self-cleaning nozzle, plenty of adjustments -- nozzle coordinates, spray force, water and seat temp, etc. Relatively straight-forward to install. If you don't have an electrical outlet next to your toilet, don't forget to pick up an extension cord. I bought the one Amazon recommended and it works great (you need a grounded one). Trouble free for about 6 months now. Only regret is that we waited so long to join the 'washlet' club!
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area, CA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried to spend so much on a bidet but it is worth every penny. I paid someone to install it so I can’t speak on that but everything else is awesome. The adjustable nozzle, temperature, self cleaning nozzle, quiet seat, heated seat. I was worried about kids playing with it but the water shuts off automatically after a time. More hygienic way to use bathroom, less toilet paper being used now. The dryer feature is good but takes too long to dry.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it (remote) goes through the batteries in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it (remote) goes through the batteries in about 4 months, and there is no way to make it work without the remote. But I updated my toilet from a 4 plus gallon to a 1.28 gal flush, now I hate every other toilet. I turn on the water heater as I sit, and in about 2-3 minutes the water is hot enough so the little heater thingy doesn't have to work all the time. We turn on the heated seat only in the winter time, as we keep our house around 64 degrees in the winter. I installed it in march/2017, was easy to install. I pd $217, and so far am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: fixitpro

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to your bathroom. It's better to have a power outlet nearby.
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks in use: In general, the seat works fine and certainly does its job. The installation wasn't hard but the lack of a power outlet next to the seat complicated it. I have to use an extension cord and it isn't ideal. A few drawbacks: hot water doesn't last long, the dryer works one side only, the seat looks bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Elman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tricky Surgery Recovery
customer_reviews.text: I recently had shoulder/rotator cuff repair on my dominant arm. My nonsurgical arm is paralyzed, so toileting is a challenge. The smart bidet has been wonderful! I love it and my 85 year-old mom is using one too. The bidet helps with wiping and makes me more independent. Get this bidet. It's such a blessing. Good quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Clare

customer_reviews.title: Happy Bottom
customer_reviews.text: My Cookie I was having problems doing the required gymnastics to wipe her bottom. She was at a friends house and had a to use the bathroom and there was a SmartBidet. When she was done, she used the remote control to , as they say on TV. "become clean as a crystal palace (sans the toilet paper). Of course I was thrilled, I got a good wash, warm air to dry myself and not one OW, OW from Cookie. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Should be issued, automatically and immediately, upon diagnosis of Crohn's disease or UC
customer_reviews.text: The device arrived in good shape after 2-day delivery. Larger box than anticipated, but well padded. Everything necessary for installation was included - installation took about 10 min. It is quiet, efficient, and thorough. After living with Crohn's disease for a couple of years, this thing was a true godsend. It has my strongest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful - but beware of Amazon trying to sell you extras
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL - this product is great. Installation is very easy. Have an electrician run place an outlet near the toilet first and then installation is great. The product heats the water and toilet seat (so nice to sit on a warm seat). If you are looking at purchasing this item and Amazon recommends buying a solid brass T adapter for the water you do not need to spend the extra $15.00. The packaging comes with everything that you need to install. This was an extra $15.00 I spent that I don't need and they will charge $6.00 for a return...
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Ducat

customer_reviews.title: Smart product has found its time
customer_reviews.text: We had remodeled our master bath some time ago and had added a hidden tank wall hung toilet. I had set up the installation for a bidet but hesitated on actually purchasing the bidet seat. The virus situation and early onset of toilet paper shortage was the prompting situation, that I decided to go ahead and take the plunge. My thoughts after the install of the "SmartBidet-1000" was amazing, the cleanliness it offers, the reduction of toilet paper, the impact it will take on sewage processing on a municipal level, the design features and craftsmanship was flawless. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BENSON

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this model
customer_reviews.text: We love our SmartBidet SB-1000. It offers all the features we wanted and more. Self-installation was easy and fast. I was able to complete the job in about 30 minutes. That included reading the well-written instructions. I was very happily surprised to find that all the supplies I needed such as a T-valve and supply hoses were included. I like the flexibility of the remote control. It allows quick installation in an eye-level location. The bidet functions work well, and the seat and water temperature is perfect for us. The only improvement we can imagine is maybe adding a temperature control for the dryer.....lol. All in all, we feel the SB-100 is a great value. We highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Baker

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a gift she likes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. After her first use, she gave it a thumbs up. I would say the angle picture instruction sheet was pretty good. I needed to refer to the manual to understand what the water button was on the first fill. The actual install was pretty easy. The plastic nuts to hold the seat in place were a little difficult. Maybe it was my toilet, but a little hard to turn. Very good first impression,
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE IN MY HOME
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t have a bathroom without these! They should be mandatory like having running water! It’s so nice to sit on a warm toilet seat when you get up in the middle of the night. I’ve had the Toto brand in the past, which were a lot more expensive, and I like Smart Bidet more. Water temp and pressure have better variances. I put these in both my homes and master guest rooms. Our guests go home and buy one after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Crohns Patient
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why it took me so long to realize I needed a bidet, but I am glad I finally did. I researched these seats for months, and this was the one I landed on. Best decision ever. Sadly many people with IBD end up with serious perianal pain from incessant wiping, and end up with UTI's and Kidney infections from e-coli. This bidet seat cleans amazingly well, and lessens those chances of infection and chafing, and pain. The remote is easy to use and adjust. The seat is plastic, so there is some sticking to it. I would recommend this to anyone, as well as purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Hinge Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: We love the bidet. How did we ever live without one. So glad to have it. But ... it broke. The plastic lid cracked is a few places at the support hole that connects to the slow close mechanism. I appears that with time the closure mechanism got bound up a bit, resulting in high stress on the support point of the lid. Crack crack crack. Now the lid just flops down. Weak point in the design. Poor.
customer_reviews.author: PCBiker

customer_reviews.title: Stop comparing and just buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've never written a purchase review so quickly. I'm so excited to share how awesome this bidet is! I spent a good amount of time searching for bidets. The word in the street was that this was the best option for people wanting water temperature control, heated seat(didn't realize how much I'd like that especially on a cold Colorado morning), and a fan. Took me less than 30 minutes to install. I'm more of a visual person so I watched a how to install video online that was really helpful. Stop comparing and just buy this one! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Or first smart bidet didn't work. The company was responsive and sent a new remote. That didn't solve the problem. Within a couple days, we received a new smart bidet. Works great! I can't imagine what more one could want from something like this, unless it have you a massage and the same time or something. Doesn't completely dry you, but seems to clean quite well, and that's the important thing. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Daseinen

customer_reviews.title: One of the best things I’ve ever purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing should come with your toilet. I still use toilet paper to dry off with but not nearly as much. This thing WILL pay for itself if you eliminate the cost of toilet paper. Don’t sit or stand on the lid. Don’t allow anything to make contact with the lid and you won’t have any issues. I seen the reviews. Those people probably need more help than this product can offer. And yes it is a flimsy lid. My 3yo son can use this thing too. Everything lines up good if he’s sitting just right and he uses the feminine button.
customer_reviews.author: Angela123

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat challenging to install. Update 16 months after purchase- the unit just stopped working. I’ve gone through all of the troubleshooting tips in the manual, but it’s dead. Warranty is only good for 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install, and is very comfortable. The heated seat is a life changer. I also love the slow close lid. It doesn't smash to the seat. The water pressure is perfect. I like the remote control as opposed to the ones where it's on the side of the seat. This is a great product. If you're looking to buy, make sure you have a round, not an oval toilet bowl.
customer_reviews.author: I love mysteries

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life
customer_reviews.text: After a trip to Europe I had to get a bidet. This item is better. Only works if one is on the heated seat, so kids can’t send streams of heated water across your bathroom. My girl says it works as advertised washing her junk. My only complaint is the dryer function: not a strong enough wind, thus the 4 star rating. Don’t get me wrong, they’ll only take this me by prying it out of my cold dead hands. damn good product
customer_reviews.author: David W. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Back door is sqeaky clean
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this toilet seat. There is one really big issue and that is, that the nozzle doesnt come out long enough for the feminine wash. Maybe I just have an extra front-facing urethra, IDK.
customer_reviews.author: distractedbygold

customer_reviews.title: Ignorance is not a blessing!
customer_reviews.text: Ignorance is not a blessing! Moving from TP to Bidet is like moving from Industrial age to Internet age. Warm water symphony on the most sensitive territory of flesh is a bliss. I look forward to putting my butts on the warm seat on cold winter nights. The demand for TP has gone down by 75%. It is so clean that your underwear will never enjoy the musky fragrance that TP used to sever after nature calling. It is a serious device which is a necessity, not a luxury. Go get it!
customer_reviews.author: Rumi

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Working fine for about a month now. The T-connector felt a bit cheap (makes me worried about water leak), and there is a small (1/4th) gap between the plastic seat and the toilet body (so, something may break or bend). IF nothing breaks, this is a good bidet.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDwellerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to but works
customer_reviews.text: The seat was MUCH simpler to install than I thought it would be. The biggest problem we had was getting an electrical outlet installed close enough to the toilet. The jet stream doesn't move side to side but its close enough I can adjust where I sit. I does get me clean with a little moving around while running. The air dryer is a good idea but doesn't really work very well. Overall it met my expectations and I am still glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Onesimus

customer_reviews.title: Product Support phone number doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I need product support but the phone number listed is not an active number. The hoses that connect the bidet to the water supply are not long enough. I must connect them to my sink because the toilet tank and attachments are located inside my wall (it's a European toilet). I haven't not been contacted by the manufacturer or vendor. I would like this installed but I need information
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install, can't believe I waited this long.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bidet I could install on my existing toilet for a while now and I knew that I didn't want to cheap out. After comparing the features of this model with competitors, it seemed that I could get similar features for much less. Awesome! The product arrived quickly and took me about 15-20 minutes to install. I wish it would have come with some Teflon plumbers tape in the box but luckily I had some on hand. All of the features work great and it has even won over my skeptical wife. My only complaint would be the blow-dryer as it doesn't dry very well but isn't a deal breaker. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Steed

customer_reviews.title: Should have spent more on the Toto bidet
customer_reviews.text: Overall, just disappointed. I would think that for a bidet one of the main features would be keeping the water warm that is splashing all over my undercarriage, not so with this one. Sometimes it's warm, sometimes not. Sometimes it starts warm and gets cold before being done. And the pressure is way inconsistent. Sometimes I have to turn it down and sometimes up. If I had no shame i would be tempted to return it. But, ya know. I always hoped I wasn't the kind of person that returns toilet seats.
customer_reviews.author: Great Job!

customer_reviews.title: hooked it up like the instruction says and the water loades into the ...
customer_reviews.text: i got it today from amazon, hooked it up like the instruction says and the water loades into the seat but it will not do what it surpose to do. it will not work , no response from the company.
customer_reviews.author: robert mori

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I would buy a bidet
customer_reviews.text: But am glad I did. Had some digestive issues for about a month and needed something like this. It works well and both my wife and me continue to use it regularly. i did take a star off for two small reasons. first, it doesn't have a bumper under the front of the seat. when my wife sat, the seat would tilt forward , so i bought a self stick bumper and put it under the front so everything feels secure now. also, it does take away a little of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: RustyB

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. As this is our first experience with bidets, we're still getting familiar with the controls but it has been a nice change from the normal bathroom routine and we are happy that we bought it. The set-up was straight forward and quick (about 30 minutes). The options for water pressure, temps, and location of wand are great. But the most important thing is: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KJ2066

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY FROM THIS COMPANY! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Christmas gift. By the time it was installed, it worked a week! Heated seat not working, water is cold, not heated properly. Dryer does not work. Now, they won't take it back or exchange it, referred me to MFG. Company had problems delivering it from the beginning, took weeks! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS DEALER! $233.00 purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Swain

customer_reviews.title: Works great for many months now
customer_reviews.text: Works great for many months now. Warning: If you have an over-toilet furniture, you might not be able to open the lid fully! Downsides: - It's not the prettiest. - It actually didn't fit my toilet. I had to be a bit inventive to make it work. - The lid is very long and mounted very high, so when opened it goes way higher than the original lid. Hence we had to remove our over-toilet storage because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Von R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality and hose is 10" too short
customer_reviews.text: Water hose that came with was 10" too short for new oval toilet as water line from wall is opposite site. idiots! Had to drop everything and run to hardware store. No Teflon as well. Seat rocks side to side. Not strongly built. Haven't tested the product yet, just got done installing moments ago. super pissed with short hose. need 30", provided 20". Generally look like poor quality parts and only read the reviews after I installed and tried it. seat does not get warm enough. Price gouging, increased more than $100 since Feb 28th due to TP shortages and Coronavirus. Very unethical and poor quality company.
customer_reviews.author: crazyhorse

customer_reviews.title: Clean heiny is nice to have...
customer_reviews.text: So far unit works great. We've tried other more expensive models by other companies and they typically only last a year or two. So this time I thought I would try a less expensive model. It works every bit as good as the other more expensive models. The quality is also up there with the other models. Time will tell if it holds out. So far we're about a year in and not a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schweiger

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and good function
customer_reviews.text: Get round or oval, as needed. Installation and positioning was easy with flexible hole pins; 10 minutes. Then connect to power and done. I use econ setting, which takes the chill of water and lid; they warm more when sitting down (sensor), but not really needed. Other settings use more power. Handy pre-flush and then Japanese-style comfort with handy remote (instead of difficult, dark reach behind you). And lids close slowly and quietly. Excellent so far (4 weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pluim

customer_reviews.title: Early Xmas present and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After spending time in Japan last year, we were converts to washlets. There is nothing better than a heated seat! . A leading Japanese brand does not supply an affordable washlet for round toilets. Opted for the Smart Bidet SB-1000 and extremely pleased with the purchase. The soft close is a great feature. Word of advice: Recommend looking for installation video online. Supplemented the installation instructions with a couple of YouTube videos and found it super easy to install. Perfectly fit an older round toilet with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great customer services
customer_reviews.text: After about 9 months using, the water tank heater stops working. I called the 1-800 customer services line and spoke to the manager. She gave a quick follow up for warranty services. And she made immediate arrangement for a shipment of new replacement part. I even received the e-mail with tracking number of the UPS shipment and also the link to video for replacement instructions.. I am happy and do appreciate their quick help and support to customers.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great except for dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's amazing. It keeps you clean. It's easy of use. I just had a major surgery that left me without the use of my arms for a while and that seat saved my dignity. I never had to ask my husband to come and wipe me because I was unclean. The only thing that doesn't work great is the drying. It takes forever. It's not powerful enough nor directed well. So I just use a towel and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: satisfait

customer_reviews.title: Works well but it’s big.
customer_reviews.text: This seat arrived on schedule and was perfectly packaged. Installation was straight forward and everything works as expected. This is our first bidet style seat and it is nice. The only reason I took off a star is the seat is very large. Our toilet is a fairly small one piece with an elongated bowl and while the SmartBidet fits it kind of dwarfs the toilet. It would be great if the engineers could figure out how to do same thing in a less imposing package.
customer_reviews.author: R2J2

customer_reviews.title: this was in the top 5 best presents ever
customer_reviews.text: According to my wife, this was in the top 5 best presents ever. It took about 30 minutes to install, and everything but the wrench was included. that thing was test-driven by several women over the holiday, and they all gave it a seal of approval. What else is there to add?
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Plumart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed this because I was having shoulder surgery and could not swing my arm around to wipe myself. Worth every penny. Warms up the water, which believe me, feels much better than the ice cold stuff at 3 am. So happy I spent the money because, even if you use it once per day, it is well worth it for the clean feeling. And using less toilet paper means the trade-off works.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good bidet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of controls. Good features. Decent price compared to other bidets of similar feature set. Fairly easy install. Includes t adapter. Minus 1 star for creaky seat which makes it feel a little cheap. I don't get that on in-laws Toto, but this was also almost $200 cheaper with similar features. I do like the blow drier too if you're not in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Smart Bidet. I've been using it for about 18 months and haven't had a problem with it. It does a great job, with a lot of built-in flexibility. I can adjust temperature, position, strength of flow, oscillation, and the heat of both the dryer and the seat. It is much less expensive that the Toto version, and with the remote control is easier to use. I am 100% satisfied with my purchase and recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: D. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about all those other good reviews. But I tried every setting, angle and position and it still just made a bigger wetter dirty mess of me down their. Need to use just as much TP if not more to clean the dirty water mess off of me and my boys if you know what I mine. Not me evidently....damn I really wanted it to work for me, a little sad it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I only buy these type products after heavy research. Met my expectations. I ordered to replace older, over-used, cracked model. Could have DIY however Plumber was replacing old toilet so had him do the install. Shipping: Well packaged. Function: A comfortable in-demand throne. Pressure and temperature balanced. Should have gotten an extra one for other toilet.
customer_reviews.author: solardude

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted 2 years. Seat cracked at year and a half. A leak has sprung somewhere inside the unit. The water supply line started spraying on the water supply line. It worked great when it was working. If they offer a warranty, buy it for at least 3 years. I have not been able to figure out where it’s leaking from.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: As good, if not better, than the Cleansense 1500R bidet
customer_reviews.text: I love the Cleansense, but after having to ship it across country for repairs twice, I bought this Smart Bidet 1000, for $110 less than cleansense. Yes, I was concerned that the SB 1000 remote was much "simpler" than the Cleansense but after having had both, I would opt for the SB. At $100+ less the Cleansense, It performs as well as the more expensive bidet. And remember, once you Bidet, you can never go back!
customer_reviews.author: fruggi

customer_reviews.title: Pro's & CONS
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Affordable (a good buy for the money), easy to understand instructions, the installation was smooth, warm seat is nice, effective CONS: Need outlet nearby, water cools off after 60 seconds, would like more angles for water and air, have to get used to the amount of time it takes to complete routine. Overall, my tushie has never been happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SmartBidet SB-1000 Electric Bidet Seat for Elongated Toilets with Remote Control- Electronic Heated Toilet Seat with Warm Air Dryer and Temperature Controlled Wash Functions (White)
product_meta.description: Style:ElongatedSmartBidet with remote is easy to install and offers its users hygiene, comfort and convenience. It is easy to use and friendly to the environment. SmartBidet also offers a stylish design and a multi-function control panel. Here are a few of SmartBidet's amazing features: Posterior wash, feminine wash, oscillating wash, warm air dryer, adjustable water pressure, hygienic filtered water, heated water, heated seat, safety on/off sensor, self-cleaning nozzle, quick release seat for easy cleaning, energy saving mode, soft close lid and seat.
feature_bullets: Multi-wash functions with self-cleaning nozzle & oscillation: for her front, her back, his back
Adjustable water pressure (5 levels), water temperature (3 levels) & nozzle positions (5 levels)
Warm air dryer, adjustable to 5 levels, which eliminates the need for toilet paper
Energy saving mode, Soft closing lid and seat, Easy to install

specifications.Included Components: Plumbing Fixtures, Toilet Seats and Bidet Seats, bidet-seats
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,397 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
